snippet.title: Röki - Pre-Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Röki is a game of adventure, courage and folklore. It’s a game about monsters that shouldn’t exist, but do. Join Tove on a fantastical journey to save her family by confronting her own past. Explore a dark forgotten fairy tail world, filled with riddles, strange locations and even stranger characters.

Röki is coming to PC (Steam and GOG) on July 23, 2020. Nintendo Switch version is coming soon.
Steam: https://bit.ly/35GT1U6 
GOG.com:  https://bit.ly/30A765f

Learn more: https://www.unitedlabelgames.com/roki/
Talk with us on Discord: https://discord.com/invite/utdlabelgames + PolyTreehouse https://discord.com/invite/polygontreehouse

#Röki | #UnitedLabel | #PolygonTreehouse |#indiedev | #indiegame

Follow the adventure via social media:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/united.label.games/ + PolyTreehouse https://www.instagram.com/polygontreehouse/
